Articles.Content:
Normally planet mods are something that I typically avoid, mainly because of the hint that Squad may have implemented additional planets sometime in the future. However, I doubt that this would be soon, so I'm looking at an additional planets mod to help hold me over until this happens, if it does. The issues is that I can be somewhat of a snob when it comes to quality of mods, as I like the mods I install to generally be the same or better quality than stock.

So my question is what's a good planet pack to install for a long term save game in 0.90? Outside of memory issues, is there any other issues that I need to keep an eye on?
Outer Planets Mod is a good one. Check the incompatibilities and fixes for said incompatibilities, though. I've heard it is completely incompatible with Environmental Visual Enhancements, though.
As far as I can tell it's just people having difficulties doing EVE atmospheres on scaled down planets - I can certainly still run EVE cloud packs on the original planets with it installed.
